Description.Text: This hotel is wonderfully located at the heart of Salou, right in the tourist centre, 10 minutes far from the beach and 3km from Port Aventura Park.An abundance of shops and entertainment venues are located in the vicinity. Public transport departs for the centre from a stop approximately 50 m from the hotel.All of the friendly, modern rooms are fitted with an en suite complete bathroom, terrace, magnetic security lock, telephone, satellite TV, central heating, air conditioning in season and optional safe box.The hotel features a pool with a paddling pool, a poolside snack bar, sun loungers and parasols, a gym, pool table, a solarium. Sun loungers and parasols are available to guests on the beach. Moreover the Hotel offers a day and night entertainment programme. As optional services, the Hotel offers: Spa zone with jacuzzi, sauna, Turkish bath, scotish shower, relax lounge, hairdressers, beauty and massage salon.

The Best Mediterraneo Hotel is located in the centre of Salou, 350 m from one of the most beautiful beaches in the Costa Dorada and 1 km to the famous theme park Universal Studios Port Aventura. Situated in one of the most central areas of Salou with majestic pine trees and lush gardens, the 3 Star Best Mediterraneo Hotel is an affordable haven from which to explore the area offering attractive rooms with air-conditioning in high season, sparkling pools for adults and children, and good dining facilities. There is a wide range of sports activities close to the hotel from water sports to hiking, paragliding, horse riding and golf as well as a lively nightlife.
Reus Airport is 12 km from the hotel and Barcelona International Airport is approximately a 1 hour drive away.
